title: Evidence-Based Decision-Making Team-Based Learning Course for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of nursing science and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Education for working nurses emphasizing practical application, utilizing smartphone-based learning materials

learning_goals: Learners can analyze clinical scenarios and make optimal decisions using evidence-based practice guidelines.
Through team-based learning activities, learners promote peer knowledge sharing and enhance collaborative problem-solving competencies.
Learners can critically evaluate research papers and derive evidence applicable to practical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
